source: "John" is the only valid first name on this example.

Important: Bear in mind that this configuration will be exported in plain text and likely kept under version control. We recommend providing these settings through your settings.php file, directly on the environment and safe from prying eyes.
Anything other than "John" would give a validation error to test different scenarios.
Only one stripe element of type @type is allowed per form.
Use the webhook signature to validate it, otherwise it will be validated by checking back with stripe.
You can use test card numbers and tokens from @link.
You must configure the API Keys on %environment for the stripe element to work.
